name: Dave Dangerous (itch)
description:
A classic, inspired by games like Mario. Fight through 50 levels of nostalgic platform mayhem.

Join Dave in his quest to save his beautiful girlfriend Daphne from the clutches of Evil Steve!

Thanks to...

KiloBolt.com for the fantastic tutorial.

OpenGameArt.org for access to many talented artists.

Kevin MacLeod for all the music from Incompetech.com
